nodes.text: Glah Ubooki's Strange & Wondrous Imports was an article in Star Wars Adventure Journal 1 that introduced several items for use in Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. It introduced Glah Ubooki, a Bimm who stumbled upon an Imperial R&D ship that been had wrecked on Bimmisaari. He managed to sell the prototype weapons and equipment to Alliance to Restore the Republic agents. When the money from that sale started to run low, he and his brothers decided to buy a ship and explore the galaxy to find other wonders and treasure. After a while, they decided to settle down and open stores to buy and sell these items.
